title: Ticket #3047: Build and distribute libcondorapi.so again
description:
In Condor 7.4.x, we distributed both dynamic and static versions of the log reader library, libcondorapi. In Condor 7.5.x (probably during the change to cmake), we stopped building the dynamic version. In current versions of Condor, third-party code that includes the log reading/writing headers will fail to compile unless they include some system headers as well.

We should start distributing a shared version of libcondorapi again. The glite project depends on it.
